designformats.specctra

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • designformats.specctra.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a layer in a Specctra dsn file.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    alfons

    • Constructor Detail

      • Layer

        public Layer(java.lang.String p_name,
             int p_no,
             boolean p_is_signal,
             java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> p_net_names)
        Creates a new instance of Layer. p_no is the physical layer number starting with 0 at the component side and ending at the solder side. If p_is_signal, the layer is a signal layer, otherwise it is a powerground layer. For Layer objects describing more than 1 layer the number is -1. p_net_names is a list of nets for this layer, if the layer is a power plane.
        Parameters:
        p_name - a String object.
        p_no - a int.
        p_is_signal - a boolean.
        p_net_names - a Collection object.

      • Layer

        public Layer(java.lang.String p_name,
             int p_no,
             boolean p_is_signal)
        Creates a new instance of Layer. p_no is the physical layer number starting with 0 at the component side and ending at the solder side. If p_is_signal, the layer is a signal layer, otherwise it is a powerground layer. For Layer objects describing more than 1 layer the number is -1.
        Parameters:
        p_name - a String object.
        p_no - a int.
        p_is_signal - a boolean.
